title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added Copilot feature matrix documentation and trial limit note (3 per payment method).
Moved budget setup from tutorials to how-tos and updated content.
Updated REST API links across code security docs for accuracy.
Restructured security permissions documentation, adding new reference pages.
Fixed a title typo in CodeQL troubleshooting docs.
Enhanced GraphQL schema: added `actorLogins` and made `actorIds` optional.
Introduced `LiquidError` class for better type safety in rendering.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Copilot feature matrix documentation and trial limit note (3 per payment method).
- Moved budget setup from tutorials to how-tos and updated content.
- Updated REST API links across code security docs for accuracy.
- Restructured security permissions documentation, adding new reference pages.
- Fixed a title typo in CodeQL troubleshooting docs.
- Enhanced GraphQL schema: added `actorLogins` and made `actorIds` optional.
- Introduced `LiquidError` class for better type safety in rendering.

### Title
Update docs: Copilot features, security permissions, API links; enhance GraphQL schema and Liquid error handling
